summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3983 for the improvement of the alley in block 14, Pontius' 4th addition, being the alley between Yale Avenue North and Pontius Avenue, from John Street to Thomas Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48449, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
